phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Wizard King gives stars to the Magic Knights Squads
The squads compete to obtain the most stars.
The Star Festival is where the number of stars each squad
has accumulated in that year is announced to the public.
While the usually peaceful Star Festival was going on,
Yami and the captain of the Green Praying Mantises, Jack the Ripper,
decide to battle it out over something insignificant.
Their issues were resolved by an unexpected turn of events,
and everyone returned to the Star Festival.
Is she from some wealthy family?
Hey, go talk to her, man.
I bet Finral would love her.
You will be my companion tonight.
That is Baron Balmain from the House of Bamilton.
First, let us enjoy this festival together.
Just who do you think I am?
We do not get to enjoy festivals like this every day,
Blue Rose Knights Squad, 3rd Class Intermediate Magic Knight Sol Marron
so let us doll ourselves up a bit, er...
Who do you think I am?
She is the captain of the Blue Rose Knights!
Blue Rose Knights Captain Charlotte Roselei
Were you planning to use me as some accessory?
And without my consent, no less.
I belong to the House of Roselei.
Did you think you could approach me so casually because I am a woman?
Is there a single way in which you are superior to me?
Honestly... where did Asta run off to now?
Well, he did take quite a flight.
I do not think I have ever seen so many people.
Feel free to take my hand at any time so you do not get lost.
Use your magic to do something about my briars.
You are as cool as ever!
You are supposed to stop her!
That guy's seriously going to die!
Looks like some drunk is dancing naked over there.
It is nothing for royalty to see.
The little runt from the distinguished service ceremony!
Who are you callin' a runt?!
I mean, you are definitely a little runt.
What was that, you little mouse?
You want me to stomp you?
I found this super awesome dress!
What I have on right now is fine.
I know you will look great in it, Sis!
Come on, do not be like that!
Your skin is as lovely and pale as ever!
Drinking at a festival is on a whole'nother level!
Eating at a festival makes the food taste even more delicious, la!
I wanted to come with Marie.
Maybe it is because we are at a festival.
Oh, it must be because I am with you, Big Brother!
Festivals get me so pumped up!
The inner man in me is raring to get out!
By being able to enjoy a different environment than we ordinarily experience in our lives,
It is such a special day.
An unforgettable page in our book of memories...
I am zero for five today.
I am doing worse than usual.
I smell an extremely beautiful lady.
There are plenty of pretty girls right here.
More importantly, what is taking the captain so long?
That helmet you always wear looks great on you, but so does this!
I am truly in the presence of a goddess right now.
The only ones allowed to get all excited about Sis's beauty are the Blue Rose Knights!
Still, I cannot let the other captains see me like this.
Like that is enough to hurt you.
Why in the world did he have to show up?
You are such a goddess, Sis!
I cannot lose my composure in front of Sol.
He might not even recognize me in this dress.
Hey, it is Her Cold and Prickly Majesty.
What the hell's with the sparkly outfit?!
What are those strange clothes you are wearing?
What in the world is that?!
You are the dirtiest, macho-est guy out there!
The Captain of the Black Bulls!
Looks like you are not training your squad members properly, rose girl.
Do not you dare come any closer to Sis dressed in that weird outfit!
I am not sure why... but I feel like I cannot afford to lose to her.
She is the Captain of the Blue Rose Knights.
She is so incredibly friendly with Yami.
Is she a member of the Black Bulls?
Who do you think you are, glaring at Sis like that?
You are just a Black Bull!
A Black Bull could not beat Sis in a billion, trillion years!
I cannot let the Blue Rose Knights keep talking to us like that!
I cannot embarrass Captain Yami any further.
There is little time left before our achievements are announced.
There is no way Sis would lose!
What kind of battle shall it be?
Just so you know, I am more powerful now than I have ever been before!
Do you have any idea who you are talking to?
I am the Captain of the Blue Rose Knights.
Th-This is turning into a huge mess!
What are we going to do, Captain?
Now, now, now, now, my lovely ladies...
We are at a festival, so why do not we all just get along?
You only know how to flirt with girls.
It is perfect for a festival night!
A battle befitting two gorgeous ladies!
There is nothing in this world that Sis cannot look good in!
Things seem rather lively over there.
Well, we are at a festival.
There does not seem to be any trouble, so I am sure it is fine.
Let us head to where they will announce the achievements.
There is nothing to be nervous about.
We will undoubtedly come out on top.
But I think the Black Bulls worked rather hard, too.
We must especially keep an eye on all of Asta's achievements.
B-But he is still just a Black Bull!
They are full of problems, regardless of their achievements!
They are no match for us, the Golden Dawn!
The Black Bulls are the lowest of the low.
First up, we have the Captain of the Blue Rose Knights, Charlotte Roselei!
We chose the same outfit as that one witch just to show how much better Sis is!
Sexy little witchie Sis is awesome!
There is no way I would lose to that woman.
Why must I wear something like this?!
Do not look at me, Yami!
Actually, maybe there is a part of me that wants you to look.
Maybe he would be a little friendlier to me if I dressed
like that girl who is way too friendly with him.
The Blue Rose Knights' captain looks pretty good in that, too.
Next up, we have a member of the Black Bulls, Vanessa Enoteca!
She is dressed as a sister of the cloth!
Apparently, you do not know anything about guys.
Guys like this sort of contrast.
She is usually exposing so much that this is actually sexy, too!
May God watch over you all.
Miz Vanessa is glowing more than usual!
Send your magic powers to the girl you like best!
I am definitely voting for the sexy little witchie, Charlotte!
Man, I do not know which to choose!
And let us stop right there!
They received the same amount of points!
After I bothered to dress like this?
I have shamed the House of Roselei.
Does he see me in a different light now?
Then my embarrassment might be worth it.
There is no way Sis got a draw!
Let us settle this once and for all!
Round two will be a swimsuit competition!
I think I kind of like this...
Anyone who agrees with him will endure the same fate.
Our Clover Premium Beer uses ingredients from right here in the Clover Kingdom!
It is rich and smooth, but you can still taste some fruity undertones!
C-Captain, you like a girl who can hold her liquor, right?
Looks like I am going to win.
We are going to have a drinking contest next!
I have entertained you this long, but that is enough.
They are going to announce our achievements soon.
We are ready to go, Sis!
Let us bring her down and show that insolent girl who is boss!
The winner will be decided by who can drink the most booze in an hour!
The beer we will be drinking is this special Clover Premium.
One of the Clover Kingdom's best!
We cannot have any little ones copying us,
and we need to savor the flavor out of respect to the brewers!
All right, let the games begin!
I have no idea what is going on, but you can do it, Miz Vanessa!
It appears that this woman is a pretty heavy drinker.
This may be a difficult match.
It looks like she already drank herself under the table!
I am not drunk at all!
I cannot believe she proposed this battle in that condition.
I am still good to go.
She cannot hold her liquor at all!
But that is another thing that is so cute about her!
The hell are those two doing?
I lost my cool because this was over Yami.
I place a curse upon the House of Roselei!
When your daughter turns eighteen, the curse will activate.
It will engulf you all and trap you within a cage of time!
Oh, how can this be, Charlotte?
If only we could figure out how to break the spell.
Please do not cry, Mother and Father.
And I will overcome this curse!
Apparently, she raised her rank again.
That newbie from the Blue Rose Knights is so powerful!
If you cannot defeat me, you could never accept my curse.
I am surrounded by weak men who are all talk.
The curse upon the House of Roselei has activated!
What the hell's the big idea, you jerk?
You flung the pasta soup I was eating everywhere.
To think I would let him see me in such a disgraceful situation!
On missions, you are as cool as a cucumber and always raring to go.
But it probably would not hurt to ask someone for help once in a while.
Our Magic Knights Squads are full of strong people you can rely on.
To have my heart stolen by a man...
That was the way to break the curse.
He is so aggravating, and yet...
You cannot finish it, can you?
Did not I tell you not to push yourself too much before?
Looks like we have another draw!
What the hell was this battle, besides a waste of time?
They are about to announce the Magic Knights Squad achievements!
All the captains are going to be there!
I hear that includes the new captains of the Crimson Lion Kings and the Purple Orcas!
I wonder what they are like!
What are we going to do?
The sexy little witchie getup just is not enough!
I want to see Sis dressed up as all kinds of things!
She is going to save us all!
I do not have time for this!
I thought there were seven transformations.
They are finally going to announce the Magic Knights Squad achievements.
You can look forward to the Black Bulls' results this year.
I know because I have watched everything you have done without blinking.
Black Clover, Page 70: Two New Stars.
